Hellpeons sword twirled int eh ari while it was fung and then landed 
next to Ultimos foot. As it did and the energy barette came near 
Hellpeon, he quickly twirled off to the side and smirked as he stood 
in the sand. His body began to pulse somewhat as his body began to 
crackle with energy, his eyes began to glow red and his body an eery 
black. 

Hellpeon: "You seem somewhat worthy of a fighter... but play time is 
over..."

With that said Hellpeon began to gather a large amount of Chaochitan 
energy into his palms, energy swirling into the orb as bits of the 
energy from Hacha's remains flew into the ball as well. Then the ball 
seemed to begin to draw solar energy and evergy generated by the 
slight wind, and perhaps some energy from Ultimo.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> Ultimo took a step back "Energy Barrette"
> 
> "Online"
> 
> A long barrette of pure energy so condense it made a solid able to 
change in shape.  Ultimo hit the sabre to the side then parried by 
having the  barrette extend towards Hellpeons sword hand.  With his 
other hand he threw  his shield in front of the blast but it knocked 
him back a bit from the close range, also obscurring the attack of 
his barrete causing Ultimo to swing his arm up the extended barrette 
going straight at Hellpeons neck from the chest area.
> 
> 
> nbwrpg@y... wrote:
> >
> > And as the flame came towards him it was quickly repeled by that 
barrier of 
> > Chaochtian energy. And once again Hellpeon tried to skewer Ultimo 
with his 
> > sabre before releasing a large blast at him.
> >
